**As a** [role]  
 **I need** [function]  
 **So that** [benefit]  

   **As a** product manager
**I need** a standardized way to capture user requirements as user stories
**So that** development and business teams clearly understand the userâ€™s needs and expected value

 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [document what you know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
Given a documented business or user requirement
When the product manager creates a user story using the standard template
Then the user story clearly defines the role, required functionality, and expected business benefit.
